p: Serum insulin [ 69], HbA1C [ 70], glucose [ 71], and the lipid profile including total cholesterol [ 72], HDL-cholesterol [ 73], and triglyceride [ 74] were assessed using commercially available kits. The level of LDL-cholesterol and VLDL cholesterol were calculated using Friedewald’s formula [ 75]. LDL-C = (TC) − (HDL-C) − (TG/5)
